Item 5.02 - Departure of Directors or Ce.content: On October 12, 2021, Johnson & Johnson (the “Company”) issued a press release announcing that Paul Stoffels, Vice Chairman of the Executive Committee and Chief Scientific Officer, has elected to retire, effective December 31, 2021. A copy of the Company's press release, dated October 12, 2021, is contained in Exhibit 99.1 to this Report.
